SEARCH
Package backend

Class Accounts

java.lang.Object
backend.Accounts
public class Accounts extends Object
The Accounts class manages user sessions within the application, including login, logout, user creation, and session status checks. It interacts with the DataProcessing class to load user information from storage and update it as needed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Accounts

      public Accounts()
      Constructor for the Accounts class. Initializes the user list from storage, sets the login status to false, and clears the current user.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public static User getUser()
      Returns the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The logged-in user, or null if no user is logged in.

    • getStatus

      public static boolean getStatus()
      Checks if a user is currently logged in.
      Returns:
      true if a user is logged in, false otherwise.

    • logIn

      public static boolean logIn(String name)
      Attempts to log in a user by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false if the user doesn't exist or someone is already logged in.

    • logOut

      public static boolean logOut()
      Logs out the currently logged-in user, if any.
      Returns:
      true if logout was successful, false if no user was logged in to begin with.

    • save

      public static void save()

    • create

      public static boolean create(User person)
      Creates a new user and adds them to the list of users if they don't already exist.
      Parameters:
      person - The User object to add.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully created, false if a user with the same email already exists.

    • exist

      public static boolean exist(String name)
      Checks if a user exists based on their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user to check for.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • find

      public static User find(String name)
      Finds a user by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, null otherwise.
